issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Insert into table partition failed but partition directory created

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: load data query fails on hdfs federation + viewfs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: This is because Hive first writes data to /tmp/ and than moves from /tmp to final destination. In federated HDFS recommendation is to mount /tmp on a separate nameservice, which is usually different than /user. Since renames across different mount points are not supported, this fails.
fields.summary: insert query fails on hdfs federation + viewfs

comments.body:
